title: News reports from France. [No. 77/145] = Chroniques de Franc
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. The kings of Notre Dame - Notre Dame defies the ages, yet through the years she has undergone numerous transformations. 2. The Veterinary - A portrait of a French country veterinary surgeon who cares for wild animals. 3. Erte - A survey of the work of set and costume designer Romain de Tietoff alias Erte. 4. The Nice International Summer Academy - An international summer school of art and music conducted in Nice by Fernand Oubradous.
